title: Fabulous Beach Front Hotel For Sale
details:
This hotel sits on 44.5 perches of land and it's perfectly located close to Hikkaduwa with direct beach access.this two storied property is the perfect place to admire the magnificent ocean views. also, this area is very popular to surfing, snorkeling to watch colorful corals and beautiful reef fish.it offers from government water line,3 phase electricity and landline telephone. also, it's tremendous privacy three sides surrounded by a brick wall and beachside chain link fence.

The property has 16 en-suite bedrooms have windows that open out to the beautiful garden and the beach.some of them boast balconies with stunning sea views and equipped with wardrobes beds and ceiling fan.it's also facilitate kitchen, dining room, store room, water tank, living room. if you can afford it grab it now it will double in value within a couple of years.
